titleStmt.title: Certain proposalls in order to the peoples freedome and accommodation in some particulars with the advancement of trade and navigation of this commonwealth in generall ... / by Henry Robinson.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, Henry, 1605?-1664?

notesStmt.note: Only such portions of this tract as bear on the questions of exchanges and of English monetary history are here reprinted.
Reproduction of original in Folger Library.
